text: is a Japanese footballer currently playing as a goalkeeper for YSCC Yokohama. ==Career== In August 2019, Tani joined Taiwanese team Taichung Futuro F.C. on a short-term loan. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Albirex Niigata Singapore |2016 |Singapore Premier League |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |Briobecca Urayasu |2018 |Kantō Soccer League |5||0||0||0||0||0||5||0 |- |rowspan="3"|YSCC Yokohama |2019 |rowspan="2"|J3 League |2||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- |2020 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !7!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!7!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japanese expatriate footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:J3 League players Category:FC Tokyo players Category:Albirex Niigata Singapore FC players Category:Briobecca Urayasu players Category:YSCC Yokohama players Category:Japanese expatriate sportspeople in Singapore Category:Expatriate footballers in Singapore
